thread.section_title: New York Hilton Midtown - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Brilliant Location,Great Staff
thread.title_full: Brilliant Location,Great Staff - Review of New York Hilton Midtown, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 46AJW2016
title: Brilliant Location,Great Staff
text:
Having stayed here before I have to admit on this stay there were aspects that I found a little disappointing.
Our room was looking a little in need of a really good touch up and possibly a better clean in the bathroom. The air con was quite noisy and we couldn't alter it.
All of the staff were so helpful and the buffet breakfast had lots of choices and great coffee.
